text: Nyagan (Russian: Нягань) is a town in the northwest of Khanty-Mansi Autonomous Okrug, Russia. It is near the Ob River and northwest of Khanty-Mansiysk. It is named after the Nyagan-Yugan River, a tributary of the Ob River. In 2010, 54,890 people lived there. Category:Cities and towns in Khanty-Mansi Autonomous Okrug
title: Nyagan
